nodes.text: Thang Le was born and raised in Southern California. He was educated in transportation design at the Art Center College of Design in Pasadena. He has worked in design and visual development for film, television, animation, interactive media, and theme parks.

He is currently a Senior Illustrator for feature film as a member of the Art Directors Guild (IATSE 800). Previously he was a Senior Visual Effects Art Director and Concept Artist at the award-winning Industrial Light & Magic, working on such properties as Star Wars, Transformers and Marvel's Avengers.
